metatags.og:description: Tears streamed down the young man’s face when he heard the announcement. There would be a zero percent increase in fees. A female friend held his face to hers and they smiled. Locked in his arms, they celebrated the moment. Around them, the news hit the weary Stellenbosch students like a wave on that Friday in October.
